item.title: Geoffrey Hinton leaves Google & warns of danger ahead
item.description: - Geoffrey Hinton, a prominent figure in artificial intelligence (AI) development and known as 'The Godfather of A.I.,' has left Google and warns of potential dangers with the AI technology he helped develop.

item.title: Help make mass surveillance of entire populations uneconomical
item.description: - Opt-out of global data surveillance programs like PRISM, XKeyscore, and Tempora to protect your privacy rights.

item.title: Krita: A professional free & open source painting program
item.description: - Krita is a professional, free and open-source painting program created by artists for artists.

item.title: JPMorgan Chase Bank Assumes All the Deposits of First Republic Bank
item.description: - JPMorgan Chase Bank has taken over all deposits of First Republic Bank.

item.title: The Little Book of Deep Learning [pdf]
item.description: - JPMorgan Chase Bank takes over deposits of failed First Republic Bank - Discussion on government's interventions during bank failures and controversies surrounding banks and their role in the economy - Experts debate potential shift from fractional reserve banking to narrow banking

item.title: Significant breakthrough in search for Parkinson's biomarker
item.description: - A new biological test, called the alpha-synuclein seed amplification assay (αSyn-SAA), can now identify Parkinson's pathology by examining spinal fluid from living patients, with over 90% sensitivity in people with typical Parkinson’s pathology, even before onset of symptoms.

item.title: A bacterial culprit for rheumatoid arthritis?
item.description: -Researchers have identified a strain of Subdoligranulum bacteria that may drive the development of Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA).

item.title: Geoffrey Hinton leaves Google & can now speak freely about his AI concern
item.description: - Geoffrey Hinton, one of the "Godfathers of AI" who won the 2018 Turing Award for his work on neural networks, has left his job at Google to speak freely about his concerns of AI risks.

item.title: Ask HN: Who is hiring? (May 2023)
item.description: - This website is best experienced by visiting the website directly.

item.title: Millions snap up new Germany-wide public transit ticket
item.description: -Over 3 million people have purchased the new Germany Ticket that allows access to all local and regional trains, buses, and metros for a flat monthly fee of 49 euros.
